import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { logoutAction } from "../../../container/actions"; import Logout from "../../imports/Logout"; const Projects = ({ posts }) => { const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const route = () => { const token = localStorage.getItem("x-access-token"); return token ? true : false; }; useEffect(() => { if (!route()) { history.push("/login"); } }, [route, history]); const logout = () => { dispatch(logoutAction()); }; const [project, setProject] = useState([]); // Delete by iD const deleteProject = (id) => { axios .delete(`http://localhost:4000/api/projects/${id}`) .then((res) => alert(res.data)); setProject(project.filter((elem) => elem._id !== id)); }; return (
